document_data.name: Beharant Diir
document_data.mainbody:
'''Beherant Diir''' was one of a group merchants who sold their wares in the town of [[Imnesvale (town)|Imnesvale]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''[sigh] I just know that one of these days, one of those ogres is going to come down and massacre me, just like those other villagers. I... I never thought of something like this when I became a merchant!''|Beherant Diir}}
document_data.Description: He was a rather portly individual.
document_data.Possessions: Beherant sold a variety of [[armor]], including [[shield]]s of many different designs and colors.
document_data.Relationships: He worked alongside several other merchants including [[Elence Fielding]] and [[Min Minling]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Beherant and his fellow merchants in town were infiltrated by a book-and-potion peddler named [[Darcin Cole|Fael]], who was in fact an agent of the [[Twisted Rune]]. When Imnesvale was threatened by mysterious disappearinces and killings, Beherant Diir blamed them on a group of [[ogre]]s who camped nearby. These killings also negatively affected Beherant's business.
